thread.title: Dragonfly Announces Change in Directors and Officers

author: cnbc.com
title: Dragonfly Announces Change in Directors and Officers
text:
VANCOUVER, British Columbia, April 30, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dragonfly Capital Corp. (the “ Company ” or “ Dragonfly ”) (listed on the NEX Board of the TSX Venture Exchange under the symbol DRC.H) announces that effective today, Messrs. Harry Chew, Sonny Chew and Trent Hunter have tendered their resignations as directors of the Company and Mr. Harry Chew has also resigned as the President, Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer of the Company. As a result, Martin Bajic, Kent Deuters and Gregory Galanis have been appointed as directors of Dragonfly. In addition, Mr. Deuters has been appointed as the President and Chief Executive Officer and Mr. Martin Bajic has been appointed as CFO.
Neither the TSX Venture Exchange nor its Regulation Services Provider (as that term is defined in the policies of the TSX Venture Exchange) accepts responsibility for the adequacy or accuracy of this release.
For further information contact:
Martin Bajic
604-551-6770
martin@nwcapital.ca
Source: Dragonfly Capital Corp.
